definitions.definition: the strong feeling that you have when something has happened that you think is bad and unfair
definitions.sensetop: in angeranger at somethinganger over somethinganger about somethinganger at somebody/somethinganger towards somebody/somethinganger against somebody/something

wordOrigin: Middle English: from Old Norse angr ‘grief’, angra ‘vex’. The original use was in the Old Norse senses; current senses date from late Middle English.
